attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fuel currently stands at over £1 per litre (almost £4.70 per gallon).  From this £1 the government is taking 46p in fuel duty and 17.5p in VAT making a total of 63.5p per £1 spent at the forecourt.  Many Europeans can buy a litre of fuel for LESS than the tax we pay here.  We request an immediate cut in either fuel duty or VAT on fuel to bring us in line with our European neighbours

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to reduce fuel duty and or VAT on fuel in the UK. From every £1 charged over 63p is tax in the form of fuel duty and (46p) and VAT £17.5p) therefore the government receives more in tax per litre of fuel than many Europeans pay for a litre of fuel.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=fueldutyrelief


Her Majesty's Government
